name: Escort Wing
description:
Overview

You are an elite starfighter stationed at starbase DX9. Your base requires additional energy to KEEP IT ALIVE. In the vastness of space, you must search and traverse the ether and find the power cores of ancient sentinels orbiting massive asteroids. When you reach a sentinel, its auto-defense system will awaken, and you must defeat the sentinel’s drones. Once the sentinels are awakened, the drones will also attack DX9 . Defend your base and retrieve the power cores needed to power your warp drives and continue your journey back home.

Controls

W/S - Forward/reverse thrust
A/D - Left/Right thrust
Mouse X - Yaw
Mouse Y - Pitch (inverted)
Q/E - Up/Down thrust
Z/C - Left/Right Roll
Spacebar - Hold to boost
L Mouse Button - Hold to fire bullets (disabled while boosting)
F1 - In-game menu

Discord: https://discord.gg/Ys4sgzD
